HazLoc Rated & Explosion Proof LED High Bays

When you're operating in a hazardous environment, safety is paramount. That's why we offer a range of hazloc-rated and explosion-proof LED high bay lights, specifically designed to withstand the most challenging conditions. These high-performance lighting solutions meet the highest safety standards, providing reliable, powerful illumination in areas where flammable gases, vapors, or dust may be present.

LED High Bay Lights for Hazardous Locations

Hazardous Location (HazLoc) and Explosion-Proof High Bay LED lights are designed for environments that have the potential for explosions or fire risks due to the presence of flammable gases, vapors, dust, or fibers. These lights have specific safety features designed to operate safely in these environments.

Features of Hazardous Location and Explosion-Proof High Bays

  1. Explosion-proof: These lights are designed to contain any explosion caused by sparks within the unit, preventing it from igniting the surrounding flammable atmosphere.
  2. Durability: LED HazLoc high bay lights are built with robust materials to withstand extreme conditions.
  3. Efficiency: Despite their rugged design, HazLoc and explosion proof lights do not compromise on energy efficiency. Like other LED lights, they consume less power compared to traditional lighting solutions.
  4. Long lifespan: LED lights have a longer lifespan, reducing the need for frequent replacements that are often challenging in hazardous locations.

Applications

Hazardous location and explosion-proof high bays are commonly used in:

  • Oil and gas facilities
  • Chemical processing plants
  • Grain storage facilities
  • Mining sites
  • Industrial manufacturing facilities with hazardous materials

Choosing a Model

When choosing a hazardous location or explosion-proof high bay, here are some things to consider:

  1. Certifications: Ensure the lights meet the necessary industry certifications for your hazardous location (for instance, Class I, Division 2, etc.)
  2. Durability and build quality: Given their intended use, these lights should be exceptionally robust and able to withstand the rigors of a hazardous environment.
  3. Brightness and efficiency: As with any lighting solution, make sure the hazardous location or explosion proof high bay lighting you choose provides the necessary light output for your needs at highest available efficiency.
  4. Temperature rating: Some hazardous environments can get hot or cold. Ensure your chosen light can operate safely and efficiently in the temperature range of your location.
  5. Warranty and support: Good warranty terms and strong manufacturer support are crucial for these types of fixtures, given the critical nature of their application.
  6. Ease of installation and maintenance: Given the potentially dangerous nature of the environment, HazLoc and explosion proof high bay lights that are easy to install and maintain can reduce risk and downtime.

Always consult with an expert or a professional in hazardous location lighting to ensure that the lighting solution you choose is appropriate for the specific requirements of your space. If you need assistance, reach out to our team today.
